column4: I have installed the Moonlight plugin that replaces silverlight by microsoft and I have tested in different site and it works now the problem is that to watch instant videos in netflix the site recognize linux as my OS therefore it gives me the message that there is no support for my OS even though I have the plugin required to play instant videos, the question is , is there a way to tell the site that I'm using a different OS.?

there's a firefox extension called useragent switcher
